group_1.textLeft: ...Let's see...@The chocolates themselves are unharmed.
All we have to do is relocate the contents to here.
Packaging that was used for other chocolates.
The chocolates that Mao gave me were wrapped in@material that doesn't leave much residue.
Meanwhile, Yakumo's chocolates@came in a tote bag.
I apologize for using recycled packaging, but@it ought to be better than packaging that's torn.

group_1.textRight: ...Is that okay?@Those were for you, Nagitan.

group_1.textLeft: Yes. As a matter of fact...I'm sure they'd@be more upset with me if I didn't lend a hand.
Do you mind if I rewrap this?
Mm, give me a minute.
You're a pro at this!
I learned how to do this from a former job of mine,@so yes, you could say I was a "pro" at that time.
...But compared to the original wrapping,@it could use a little more decoration.

group_1.textRight: Nagitan! I want you to use this!

group_1.textLeft: That ribbon...was that a gift to you?

group_1.textRight: No, it was going to be a gift FROM me, but...
I think...no, I'm completely certain!@The person I was giving it to would do the same.
So, I want you to use it.

group_1.textLeft: ...I see. I'll put it to good use.
...@[wait:1.5][chara:101650:motion_400][chara:101650:cheek_0][chara:101650:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:101650:lipSynch_1]...There!
Sorry for the wait.
Sorry, there's a little chocolate that won't@fit since the new container is smaller...
I'm glad that I could help.
Ehehe, it all worked out!

group_1.textRight: Hey, if you'd like...here, for you...

group_1.textLeft: This is...the chocolate that didn't fit.
Didn't you get this chocolate for your family?

group_1.textRight: But it's only because of you two@that I can give it to them.

group_1.textLeft: No, but...

group_1.textRight: that Valentine's Day is a day where@we show our appreciation.

group_1.textLeft: In that case, we'll gladly accept!
...Hm, I suppose it would be disrespectful@to decline your gratitude.
Thank you for this gift.
